issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Query Processor
components.description: Tracks issues dealing with query processing.

fields.description: Seems like this test passes for hadoop-1 but is flaky.

comments.body:

Had already opened HIVE-6401 for this one - looks like hadoop-2 is returning back directories during getSplits()
Oh, missed that one. Resolving this one as dupe of HIVE-6401
